alternative name for specreator

Source: R/specreator.R
spectrograms.Rd

alternative name for specreator

spectrograms(
  X,
  wl = 512,
  flim = "frange",
  wn = "hanning",
  pal = reverse.gray.colors.2,
  ovlp = 70,
  inner.mar = c(5, 4, 4, 2),
  outer.mar = c(0, 0, 0, 0),
  picsize = 1,
  res = 100,
  cexlab = 1,
  propwidth = FALSE,
  xl = 1,
  osci = FALSE,
  gr = FALSE,
  sc = FALSE,
  line = TRUE,
  col = "#07889B",
  fill = adjustcolor("#07889B", alpha.f = 0.15),
  lty = 3,
  mar = 0.05,
  it = "jpeg",
  parallel = 1,
  path = NULL,
  pb = TRUE,
  fast.spec = FALSE,
  by.song = NULL,
  sel.labels = "selec",
  title.labels = NULL,
  dest.path = NULL,
  ...
)

Details

see specreator for documentation. specreator will be deprecated in future versions.
